title: Add tests for new status icons and awaiting display
description:
Add unit tests for new StatusIcon() behavior and awaiting field handling.

File: internal/tui/model_test.go

Tests to add:
1. TestTaskInfo_StatusIcon_Emoji - verify all emoji icons render correctly

4. TestUpdate_TasksUpdate_WithAwaiting - verify awaiting field propagates
